titleStmt.title: The Catholick cause, or, The horrid practice of murdering kings, justified, and commended by the Pope in a speech to his cardinals, upon the barbarous assassination of Henry the Third of France, who was stabb'd by Jaques Clement, a Dominican Fryar : the true copy of which speech, both in Latin, and also faithfully rendred into English, you have in the following pages.
De Henrici Tertii morte sermo. English & Latin
titleStmt.author: Sixtus V, Pope, 1520-1590.

titleStmt.title: The Catholick cause, or, The horrid practice of murdering kings, justified, and commended by the Pope in a speech to his cardinals, upon the barbarous assassination of Henry the Third of France, who was stabb'd by Jaques Clement, a Dominican Fryar : the true copy of which speech, both in Latin, and also faithfully rendred into English, you have in the following pages.
De Henrici Tertii morte sermo. English & Latin
titleStmt.author: Sixtus V, Pope, 1520-1590.
Clemens non Papa, Jacobus, ca. 1510-ca. 1555.

notesStmt.note: Text in double columns, Latin and English.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
